hymns.title: WHO WILL FOLLOW JESUS?
hymns.lyric:
1.
Who will follow Jesus, Standing for the right
Holding up His banner In the thickest flight?
List’ning for His orders, ready to obey
Who will follow Jesus, Serving Him today?
Chorus
Who will follow Jesus? Who will make reply,
‘I am on the Lord’s side, master here am i?
Who will follow Jesus? Who will make reply,
‘I am on the Lord’s side.
2.
Who will follow Jesus, In life’s busy ways
Working for the Master, giving Him the praise
Earnest in His vineyard, honoring his laws
Faithful to his counsel, watchful for his cause?
3.
Who will follow Jesus, when the temperature charms
Fleeing, then for safety to the savior’s arms
Trusting in His mercy, trusting in His pow’r
Seeding fresh renewals of his grace each hour?
4.
Who will follow Jesus In His work of love,
Leading others to Him
Lifting prayers above?
Courage, faithful servant
In his word we see, on our side for ever
Will this savior be?

hymns.title: METWERE BASA A εNWU DA NO
hymns.lyric:
1.
‘YƆnkofa bεn ni, anigye kronkron

Metwere basa a εnwu da no.
NyesoƆ
Metwere, metwere
(Metwere Yesu, metwere Yesu)
Akomatuo nni me so bio
Metwere, metwere
Metwere basa a εnwu da no.
2.
Akwantu yi mu nanteε ayε dε

O hwε sε me kwan no mu hyerεn daa

3.

hymns.title: LEANING ON THE EVERLASTING ARMS
hymns.lyric:
1.
What a fellowship what a joy divine,
Leaning on the everlasting arms
What a blessedness, what a peace is mine,
Leaning on the everlasting arms.
Chorus
Leaning, leaning
Safe and secure from all alarms
Leaning on the everlasting arms.
2.
O how sweet to walk in this pilgrim way,
Leaning on the everlasting arms
O how bright the path grows from day to day,
Leaning on the everlasting arms
3.
What have I to dread, what have I to fear,\
Leaning on the everlasting arms
I have blessed peace with my Lord so near
Leaning on the everlasting arms.

2.

hymns.title: I’LL GO WHERE YOU WANT ME TO GO
hymns.lyric:
1.
It may not be on the mountain’s height,
Or over the stormy sea
It may not be at the battle’s front
My Lord will have need of me
But if I am needed anywhere,
In paths that I do not know
I’ll answer, dear Lord, with my hand in Thine
I’ll go where you want me to go.
Chorus
I’ll go where you want me to go
Over mountain, or plain or sea
2.
Perhaps today there are loving words
Which Jesus would have me speak
There may be now in the paths of sin
Some wand’rer whom I should seek
O Savior, if thou wilt be my guide
Tho’dark and rugged the way
My voice shall echo thy message sweet
I’ll say what you want me to say.
3.
There’s surely somewhere a lowly place
In earth’s harvest fields so wide
Where I may labor thro’life’s short day
For Jesus, the Crucified
So trusting my all to Thy tender care
And knowing thou lovest me
I’ll do thy will with a heart sincere
I’ll be what you want me to be.

hymns.title: PAANOO NO BUBUO
hymns.lyric:
1.
Wura pa yεbubu paanoo no de kae
Saa afƆre kεseε no wƆ Calvary
Yε‘yε sei Awurade da Kristo n’ahyε
Hyira asuafoƆ a wƆbu paanoo no seisei.
2.
Hyira kuruwa yi so ma yεn nnε‘wura pa.
Ma yεn mfa koma pa ntie n’sεm no
Yεpae ne wuo mu ka sεdeε Ɔpε
Yεdi saa daa yi kosi sε Ɔbεba
3.
Yε‘Agyenkwa no di hene wƆ soro

Ɔforo kƆ soro akƆdi hene
Ɔyε yε ‘adamfo pa, Ɔtuaa yεn ka no.

hymns.title: THE BREAKING OF BREAD
hymns.lyric:
1.
Dear Lord, we break the bread,
In memory, of that great sacrifice on Calvary
This we do each Lord’s day,
As Christ hast said,
bless all disciples now who break the bread.
2.
Bless thou the cup dear Lord,
To us this day, may we with hearts prepared
His word obey, we now his death proclaim
In his own way, until he comes again,
We keep this day.
3.
Our Savior now doth reign
In heaven above, death’s pow’r He overcame
Such matchless love; to heav’n he did ascend
There He’s enthroned, he is our dearest friend
For us atoned.

hymns.title: BƆNHWA MU SUKOOKO
hymns.lyric:
1.
Mafa Yesu sε m’adamfo
Ɔyε me biribiara
Ɔda mpemdu mu bafua ma me kra
Ɔyε bƆnhwa mu sukooko
Ne mu nko na mehu
Deε mehia horo me ho na ama m’adi mu
Ɔkyekye me werε awerεhoƆm
ƆsƆ me mu amaneεm
Ɔse menfa me dadwene nto no so\
Ɔyε bƆnhwa mu sukooko
NƆpa nsoromma εhyerεn
Ɔda mpemdu m u bafua ma  me kra.
2.
Wayi m’awerεhoƆ nyinaa,Wasoa me yea nyinaa
WƆ sƆhwε mu Ɔyε me aban kεse
M’agyaa ade nyinaa ama no
Masεe m’ahoni nyinaa
Afi me komam n’afei mehyε ne tumi ase
Sε wiase nyinaa po me a
Na bonsam sƆ me hwε a
Yesu nti mεduru botae no ho dwoodwoo
Ɔyε bƆnhwa mu sukooko
NƆpa nsoromma εhyerεn
Ɔda mpemdu mu bafua ma me kra
3.
Ɔnya me dabiara da na Ɔnpo me wƆ ha
Se mete gyidie mu na meyε ne pε a
W’ayε gya atwa me ho ahyia mensuro bribiara
Ɔde ne manna no kum me kra kƆm no
Ɔbεhwim me akƆ soro akƆhu n’anim
Deε anigye nsuo send aa nyinaa
Ɔyε bƆnhwa mu sukooko
NƆpa nsoromma εhyerεn
Ɔda mpemdu mu bafua ma me kra.

hymns.title: THE LILY OF THE VALLEY
hymns.lyric:
1.
I have found a friend in Jesus, he’s everything to me
He’s the fairest of ten thousand to my soul
The lily of the valley, in Him alone I see
All I need to cleanse and make me fully whole
In sorrow he’s my comfort, in trouble he’s my stay
He tells me every care on Him to roll
He’s the bright and morning star, he’s the fairest of
Ten thousand to my soul
2.
O He all my griefs has taken and all my sorrows home,
In temptation he’ s my strong and mighty tow’r
I have all for him forsaken and all my idols torn
From my heart, and now he keeps me by His pow’r
Tho all the world forsake me, and Satan tempt me sore
Thru Jesus I shall safely reach the goal,
He’s the bright and morning star, he’s the fairest of
Ten thousand to my soul.
3.
He will never, never leave me, nor yet forsake me here
While I live by faith and do His blessed will
A wall of fire about me, I’ve nothing now to fear,
With His manna He my hungry soul shall fill.
Then sweeping up to glory to see His blessed face
Where rivers of delight shall ever roll,
He’s the bright and morning star, he’s the fairest of
Ten thousand to my soul.

hymns.title: NYAME ASAFO
hymns.lyric:
1.
Nyame abusua ne n’asƆre kronkron
Ɔde ne nyansa n’εtee, hyε ne den
DwanekƆbea ma mpanyin, mƆfra
Ne mu na nokwasεm fi kƆ.
NyesoƆ
Kristo asafo
Ɔde ne mogya atƆ no aboƆden
Nyame ahennie hotefoƆ tenabea
Nkwa ahenman ma NyankopƆn mma
2.
WƆn a wƆadi wuo so o wƆ nohoaa
Agyedifo nso te ase ha
NkurofoƆ kuo baanu yi bom yε
Fie baako awoƆ kronkron mu.
3.
εhƆ animuonyam, εha nhyira
AnidasoƆ koro ‘wurade din mu
Asafo koro ne nkyerεkyerε koro
N’aba tenenee hyira aman nyinaa

hymns.title: THE CHURCH OF GOD
hymns.lyric:
1.
God’s family is his church divine
Begun, sustained by his wise design,
The ark of age and the shrine of youth
From her alone goes the word of truth.
Chorus
The church of Christ
Redeemed by His blood
What a purchase price
The kingdom of God and the saints’abode
The realm of life for the sons of God.
2.
Beyond are those who have conquered death
Below are they who abide in faith
The twain you host and the saints of earth
One household are by a holy birth.
3.
What glory there, o what blessings here
One hope, on Lord and His name to wear
One church, one creed, meeting ev’ry need
All nations blest by His righteous seed.

hymns.title: ABAN KεSE
hymns.lyric:
1.
Yεn Nyame yε abankεse
Kyεm a enni huammƆ da
Ɔno na Ɔyε yεn boafoƆ
Ɔbra nsuyiri yi mu
Yεn tamfo dada no
Hwehwε yεn sεeε ara
Ne nnaadaa tumi so
Ɔtan ahyε  no ma
Ne so bi nni asaase yi so.
2.
Yεn ankasa ahoƆden mu no
Yεn mmƆdenmƆ bεyε kwa
Barima pa bi wƆ yεafa
Deε Onyame apa no no
Wobisa oniiko?
Kristo Yesu ne No.
Asafo Awurade
Ɔnsakyera mfesanten mu
Na εtwa sε odi nim
3.
Sε bƆne ahyε wiase ma
Repε sε εseε yεn a
Yεrensuro Nyame ama
N’asεm nam yεn so di nim
Yεhwere ahode, abusua
Na saa nkwa tia’ yin so
WƆbεkum nipadua yi
Nyame asεm te hƆ daa
Nahenie no wƆ hƆ daa nyinaa.

hymns.title: A MIGHTY FORTRESS
hymns.lyric:
1.
A mighty fortress is our God.
A bulwark never failing
Our helper He, amid the flood
Of mortal ills prevailing, For still our ancient foe
Doth seek to work us woe
His craft and pow’r are great
And armed with cruel hate,
On earth is not his equal
2.
Did we in our own strength confide
Our striving would be losing
Were not the right one on our side
The man of God’s own choosing
Dost ask who that may be?
Christ Jesus, it is he
Lord Sabaoth His name
From age to age the same
And he must win the battle.
3.
And tho’ this world with evil filled
Should threaten to undo us
We will not fear, for God hath
Willed his truth to triumph through us
Let goods and kindred go,
This mortal life also
The body they may kill
God’s truth abideth still ,
His kingdom is forever.

hymns.title: ASεNDUA FRANKAA
hymns.lyric:
1.
WƆama adehyee frankaa no so
Ma Ɔhene asraafoƆ no.
Yεma so εnnε sε nsεnkyerεne bi
W’atƆ yεn nti yεto dwom
NyesoƆ
Yε‘bƆ nsra kƆ yeanim
Kristo nti bu bribiara adehwerε
Yεbεbrε, ato dwom ma ahene mu hene
Asεnnua frankaa no ase.
2.
Sε tamfoƆ no bofu sƆre tia yεn a
Mo ma yεn nhim frankaa no
Na yεn nyinaa pintinn sε Awurade asraafoƆ
Na yεn sƆ nokorε no mu.
3.
Asaase so, po so baabi ‘ nnipa te
Yεnfa n’uonyam nsεm yi nkyerε
Yεnka frankaa kƆkƆƆ no ho asεm nkyerε
Bere a Owura no reyi ne deε.
4.
Sε yεn sahene kεseε no fi εsoro
BƆ wusƆre dawuro no a
Ɔtanfo no bεwu yεn hene n’anim
Na ahotefoƆ atwam akƆ.

hymns.title: THE BANNER OF THE CROSS
hymns.lyric:
1.
There’s a royal banner given for display
To the soldier of the King
As an ensign fair we lift it up, today
While as ransomed ones we sing
Chorus
Marching on, marhing on
For Christ count everything but loss
For the King of Kings toil and sing
Neath the banner of the cross
2.
Tho’the foe may rage and gather as the flood
Let the standard be displayed
And beneath its folds, as soldiers of the Lord
For the truth be not dismayed
3.
Over land and sea, wherever man may dwell
Make the glorious tidings known;
Of the crimson banner now the story tell
While the Lord shall claim His own
4.
When the Great Commander, from the vaulted sky,
Sounds the resurrection day,
Then before our King the faint and foe shall die
And the saints shall march away.

hymns.title: YESU FRε YεN
hymns.lyric:
1.
Yesu frε yεn wƆ bere a
Ɔbra asorεkye bƆ yεn
Ne nne dεεdε gyegye daadaa
Sε Kristoni di makyi
2.
Tetemerε mu asomafo
Tee wƆ Galilee po so n’
WƆgyaa abusua, ne ne adwuma
KƆdii wƆn dƆfo n’akyi
3.
Yesu frε yεn sε mma yεnnsom
Wiase mu neεma buhuo
Ɔhwε neεma εsom yεn bo ka
Sε Kristoni dƆ m’kyεn eyi.
4.
Anigye ne awerεho mu
Dwumaden ne ahomegye mu
Ɔda so frε yεn sε yεnnƆ
No εnkyεn ade nyinaa.
5.
Yesu frε yεn: O Agyenkwa
Yεserε ma yεnte wo frε no
Yεn koma nyε setie ma wo
YεnnƆ wo nkyεn ade nyinaa.

hymns.title: JESUS CALLS US
hymns.lyric:
1.
Jesus calls us o’er the tumult of our life’s wild
restless sea
day by day his sweet voice soundeth, saying
Christian follow me
2.
Jesus calls us from the worship
Of the vain world’s golden store
From each I do that would keep us
Saying Christian, love me more
3.
In our joys and in our sorrows,
Days of toil and hours of ease
Still He calls, in cares and pleasures,
Christian, love me more than these
4.
Jesus calls us: by thy mercies
Savior, make us hear thy call
Give our hearts to thine obedience
Serve and love thee best of all

hymns.title: MONYINA AKO NO
hymns.lyric:
1.
Ao me nkurofo monhwε frankaa
No renyam wƆ soro
Afei nkyidƆm reyi wƆnho
Nkonim abεn
NyesoƆ
Monyina Ɔko n’ano na me’eba
Yesu renyam nsa
Mo nye so ase no soro hƆ sε
Woadom nti yε gyina.
2.
Hwε dƆm kεse bi a wƆreba
Bonsam di wƆn anim
Akatakyie rehwe ase
Mmarima bo retu
3.
Hwε nkonim frankaa no renyam
Tie abεn rehyεn
Yεbεdi nim, yεn hene din mu
Atamfo nyinaa so.
4.
Ɔko no akyε na emu ayε den
Nso yεn moa rebεn
Yεn sahene kεse no reba
Me nua nya akomato m’.

hymns.title: HOLD THE FORT
hymns.lyric:
1.
Ho, my comrades, see the signal waving in the sky
Reinforcements now appearing
Victory is nigh.
Chorus
Hold the fort, for I am coming
Jesus signals still wave the answer back to heaven
By the grace we will.
2.
See the mighty host advancing,
Satan leading on; mighty men around us falling
Courage almost gone
3.
See the glorious banner waving
Hear the trumpet blow
In our Leader’s name we’ll triumph
Over every foe.
4.
Fierce and long the battle rages,
But our help is near;
Onward comes our great commander
Cheer, my comrades, cheer.

hymns.title: ME GYEFOƆ
hymns.lyric:
1.
Mεto megyefoƆ dƆ nwanwa
A ƆwƆ ma me no ho ndwom
Ɔhu amane asεndua so
De gyee me fi musuo mu.
NyesoƆ
O to me gyefo ho nwom
Ɔde ne mogya tƆ me
ƆtƆƆ me fafiri no asendua so
Tua me ka maa medee me ho.
2.
Mεka anwanwa asεm yi
Adeε a mehweree no me nsa aka
Ɔfin e dƆ ne ahumƆbƆ kεses m’
Tuaa me ka maa medee me ho.
3.
Mεyi me gyefo dƆfo no ayε
Mεka ne nkunim tumi ho asεm
Ɔma ne di nkunim wƆ
BƆne, owuo ne asaman so.
4.
mεto me gyefo soro dƆ
A ƆwƆ ma me no ho nwom
Nyame ba no ayi me afi
Owuo mu aba ne nkyεn

hymns.title: MY REDEEMER
hymns.lyric:
1.
I will sing of m Redeemer,
And his wondrous love to me
On the cruel cross he suffered
From the curse to set me free.
Chorus
Sing, oh sing of my redeemer
With his blood he purchased me
On the cross he sealed my pardon
Paid the debt and made me free
2.
I will tell the wondrous story,
How my lost estate to save
In his boundless love and mercy
He the ransom freely gave
3.
I will praise my dear redeemer
He triumphant pow’r I’ll tell
How the victory, he giveth
Over sin, and death, and  hell
4.
I will sing of my redeemer
And his heav’nly love to me
He from death to life hath brought me
Son of God with Him to be.

hymns.title: O Sε MεYε Sε WO
hymns.lyric:
1.
Sε mεyε sε wo o gyefoƆ hyirafoƆ
εyin ne me daa pε ne adesrε
Mede anigye bεpo wiase ahonya
Yesu na mayε pε sε wo ara.
NyesoƆ
Sε mεyε sε wo, sε mε yε sε wo
GyefoƆ hyirafoƆ, wo ahoteε mu
Bra woahoεfε mu, bra wo mayε mu
Fa wo suban no hyε me komam
2.
Sε mεyε sε wo ayamhyehyeε mu
BƆnefafiri ne ayamye mu
Mεboa onibie, deε w’atƆ baha
Mahwehwε bƆnefoƆ akobƆfoƆ.
3.
Sε mεyε sε wo ahobreaseε mu
Mayε kronkron adwo akokoƆdurum
Matumi agye animka bi ara
Mahu amane agye ebinom.
4.
Sε mεyε sε wo mewura mereba
Abεgye abodin kronkron no
Mede deε mewƆ nyinaa ara reba
Awurade ne nyinaa yε wo deε afei.

hymns.title: O TO BE LIKE THEE
hymns.lyric:
1.
O to be like Thee, blessed redeemer
This is my constant longing and pray’r
Gladly I’ll forfeit all of earth’s treasures
Jesus, thy perfect likeness to wear.
Chorus
O to be like thee
O to be like thee blessed redeemer
Pure as thou art, come in thy sweetness
Come in thy fullness, stamp thine own image
Deep in my heart
2.
O to be like thee, full of compassion
Loving, forgiving, tender and kind
Helping the helpless, cheering the fainting
Seeking the wand’ring sinner to find
3.
O to be like thee, lowly in spirit,
Holy and harmless, patient and brave
Meekly enduring cruel reproaches
Willing to suffer, others to save.
4.
O to be like thee, Lord, I am coming
Now to receive th’anointing divine
All that I am and have I am bringing.
Lord, form this moment all shall be thine.

hymns.title: ADOM NWANWA
hymns.lyric:
1.
Adom nwanwa, ne dε a εyε
εgyee me mƆborƆni
Anka na mayera afei wahu me
M’anifurae afei me hu ade.
2.
Adom n’εkyerε mekoma suro
N’adom n’εyii me suro
Berε a me yεε setie maa asεm no
Adom no pue’ maa me.
3.
Mefaa haw ne amaneε mu
Ansa na meduu ha
Adom n’εdee me duu ha dwoodwoo
Na εbεdi manim akƆ fie.
4.
Awurade de papa ahyε me bƆ
N’asεm ma manidasoƆ tim
Ɔbεyε me kyεm ne kyεfa
Meda so te nkwam yi.
5.
Sε yetena hƆ mfeε mpendu a
Owia bεkƆ so ahyerεn
YεbεkƆso ayi Nyame ayε
Te sε yεhyεε ase no.

hymns.title: AMAZING GRACE
hymns.lyric:
1.
Amazing grace how sweet the sound
That saved a wretch like me
I once was lost, but now I’m found,
Was blind, but now I see.
2.
Twas grace that taught my heart to fear
And grace my fears allayed
How precious did that grace appear
When I his word obeyed.
3.
Thru many dangers, toils and snares,
I have already come
Twas grace that br’t me safe thus far
And grace will lead me home
4.
The Lord has promised good to me,
His word my hope secures
He will my shield and portion be
As long as life endures.
5.
When we’ve been there ten thousand years,
Bright shining as the sun
We’ve no less days to sing God’s praises
Than when we first begun.

hymns.title: YESU ANWANWA DƆ
hymns.lyric:
1.
Me kra ma ne nne so
De naaseε kƆ soro hƆ
Kronkronyε mu.
Obi nni hƆ a Ɔbεtumi
Ayi Yesu anwanwa dƆ ayε
NyesoƆ
Anwanwa dƆ anwanwa dƆ
Yesu anwanwa dƆ yi
2.
Nigye adekyeεm, ‘somdwoe anadwo
Koomyε haw mu, hann adesae mu
Aduro yea mu. HoƆden mereyε m’
Ne saa Yesu anwanwa dƆ yi.
3.
Me bƆne fafiri anidasoƆ
Me pagyafoƆ mahweaseε mu
Nkwa mu o’wuo mu o me bribiara
Ne Yesu anwanwa dƆ yi.

hymns.title: WONDERFUL LOVE OF JESUS
hymns.lyric:
1.
In vain in high and holy lays
My soul her grateful voice would raise
For who can sing the worthy praise
Of the wonderful love of Jesus.
Refrain
Wonderful love, wonderful love,
Wonderful love of Jesus
2.
A joy by day, a peace by night
In storms a calm, in darkness light
In pain a balm, in weakness might
Is the wonderful love of Jesus
3.
My hope for pardon when I call,
My trust for lifting when I fall
In life, in death, my all
Is the wonderful love of Jesus.

hymns.title: KA TETESεM NO KYERε ME
hymns.lyric:
1.
Ka tetesεm no kyerε me,εsoro ahuntasεm
Yesu ne n’nuonyam ho asεm,Yesu ne ne dƆ ho asεm
Ka ‘sεm no pefee kyerε me sε,Woreka akyerε abofra
Fisε me yƆ merε na m’abrε,Me nni moa efi aka me.
NyesoƆ
Ka tetesεm no kyerε me,Ka tetesεm no kyerε me
Ka tetesεm no kyerε me,Yesu dƆ ho asεm.
2.
To w’bo ka ‘sεm no kyerε me,Na mentumi nte aseε
Saa Nyame Ɔgyeε nwanwa no
BƆne ano aduru.
Si so ka kyerε me mpεn pii
Fise meyare awerεfiri
Ahanamakye bosuo no
Awe awiabere mu.
3/
Ka ‘sεm no bƆkƆ kyerε me
Ma no nyε ahiasεm
Kae sε me ne bƆneyεI a
Yesu bae bεgyee no
Ka’sεm no mere nyinaa
Sεwopε ampaara
Ahokyerε mere biara mu
εma m’akomatƆm.
4.
Ka asεm koro no ara kyerε me
Berε a wosuro so
Wiase anuonyam huhuo yi
Retwe m’adwen dodo
Yiw, sε wiase’nuonyam yi
Refa me kra yi a
Ka tetesεm no kyerε me
Sε Kristo bεgyee me.

hymns.title: TELL ME THE OLD, OLD STORY
hymns.lyric:
1.
Tell me the old, old story of unseen things above,
Of Jesus and his glory, of Jesu and his love
Tell me the story simply, as to a little child
For I am weak and weary, and helpless and defiled
Chorus
Tell me the old, old story, tell me the old, old story,
Tell me the old, old story of Jesus and his love.
2.
Tell me the story slowly, that I may take it in
That wonderful redemption, God’s remedy for sin
Tell me the story often, for I forget so soon
The early dew of morning, has passed away at noon.
3.
Tell me the story softly, with earnest tones, and graves
Remember I’m the sinner whom Jesus came to save
Tell me the story always, if you would really be
In anytime of trouble, a comforter to me
4.
Tell me the same old story,
when you have caused to fear, that this world’s empty
glory, is costing me too dear, yes, and when that
world’s glory is dawning on my soul, tell me the old
old story, Christ Jesus makes thee whole.

hymns.title: WO Yε KεSE
hymns.lyric:
1.
O me Nyame, sε mede ahodwiri dwene
Wiase nyinaa a wode wo nsa ayε a
Mehu nsoroma, mete agradaa huuhuu
Wotumi da adi wo wiase nyinaa.
NyesoƆ
Me kra to dwom ma wo me NyankopƆn
Woyε kεse, wo yε kεse
Me kra to dwom ma wo me NyankopƆn
Woyε kεse, wo yε kεse.
2.
Sε me nante kwaeε ne mfofoo mu a
Na mete nomaa to wƆn nnwom dεεdε
Na meto mani fi mepƆ atifi a
Mete nsuo a εwororso ne mframa dεεdε
3.
Na sε medwene sε Nyame ankame neb a
Na Ɔsoma no maa no ba bεwui
Asεndua so, Ɔsoaa m’adesoa anigyem’
Ɔtuu mogya, wui de yii me bƆne.
4.
Sε Kristo ba wƆ osebƆ denden mu a
Abεfa me a mεnya anigye kεse
HƆ na mεkoto ahobreaseε ne ayεyie m’
Na mateam sε me Nyame wo yε kεse.

hymns.title: ASAASE A εKORƆN
hymns.lyric:
1.
Merepem kƆ soro kwan so
Da biara me kƆ manim ara
Ɔkwan no mu me bƆ mpae sε
Wurade fa me si bea a εkorƆn
NyesoƆ
‘wurade ma me so mame nfa
Gyedie ngyina soro asaase so
Gyinabea a εkorƆn sen deε manya
‘wurade fa me si bea a εkorƆn.
2.
Mekra nni Ɔpε sε Ɔbetena
Bea akyinyi wƆ na suro bu abam
Sε ebinom bεtena bea sei a
Me botae yε asaase a εkorƆn.
3.
Sε bonsam ha me sεn ara
Me pε sε me boro wiase so
Fisε gyediem mate nnwom bi
HotefoƆ nnwom bea a εkorεn hƆ.
4.
Me pε sε meforo kƆ soro hƆ
Kεhwε animuonyam a εhyerεn
Nanso me bƆ mpae daa sε
‘wura di m’anim kƆ bea a εkorƆn.

hymns.title: HIGHER GROUND
hymns.lyric:
1.
I’m pressing on the upward way,
new heights I’m gaining ev’ry day
still praying as I onward bound,
lord, plan my feet on higher ground.
Chorus
Lord, lift me up and let me stand,
By faith, on heaven tableland
A higher place than I have found
Lord, plant my feet on higher ground
2.
My heart has no desire t stay
Where doubts arise and fears dismay
Tho some may dwell where these abound
My prayr, my aim is higher ground
3.
I want to live above the world,
Tho’ Satan’s darts at me are hurled
For faith has caught the joyful sound,
The song of saints on higher grounds
4.
I want to scale the utmost height,
And catch a gleam of glory bright
But still I’ll pray till heaven I’ve found
Lord’lead me on to higher ground.

hymns.title: NHYIRA BOSUO
hymns.lyric:
1.
Nhyira bosuo bi bεgu
εyi yε Nyame bƆhyε
Ahomegye merε bi bεba
εfi soro Agyenkwa nkyεn.
NyesoƆ
Nhyira bosuo, yεhia nhyira bosuo
HumƆbƆ nsuo tƆ gu yεn so
Nanso yεserε bosuo yi
2.
Nhyira bosuo bi bεgu
εbεma yεn nkanyan
NkokoƆ so ne abun mu
Nsuo no retƆ  pii
3.
Nhyira bosuo bi bεgu
Ma εmra yεn so Awurade
Yε srε wo ma yεn ahodwoƆ
Bra, na me wasεm no mra m’
4.
Nhyira bosuo bi begu
O ma no ntƆ εnnε
Yεpae mu ka kyerε Nyame
Yeresu frε Yesu yi.
5.
Nhyira bosuo bi begu
Sε yε gyedi yε sotie a
Ahomegye merε bi bεba
Sε yε ma no yε deε εpεa.

hymns.title: SORO AWIA HANN
hymns.lyric:
1.
Menam awia mu, makwantu yi mu
WƆ mmepƆ so ne abun mu
Yesu ada sε merenya wo da
Yesu aka sε merennya wo da
BƆhyε kronkron a εtim hƆ daa.
NyesoƆ
Soro awia hann, soro awia hann
De anuonyam kronkron ba me kra so
Halle lujah, meredi ahurusie
Mereyi n’ayε, Yesu yε mede.
2.
εsum a atwa me ho ahyia yi
Entumi nka magyenkwa no nhyε
Ɔno na Ɔyε hann, εsum nni ne mu
MekƆso nante ne nkyεn daa.
3.
Owia hann no mu medi ahurusie
Merepem so kƆ soro aban mu
Meyi nayε me nante anigyem
Menam wia hann mu, ƆdƆ hann no.

hymns.title: HEAVENLY SUNLIGHT
hymns.lyric:
1.
Walking in sunlight, all of my journey
Over the mountains thru the deep vale
Jesus has said I’ll never forsake thee
Promise divine that never can fail.
Chorus
Heavenly sunlight,Heavenly sunlight,
Flooding my soul with glory divine
Hallelujah, I am rejoicing, singing his praises,
Jesus is mine.
2.
Shadows around me, shadows above me
Pressing my way to mansions above
Singing his praises gladly I’m walking
Ever I’m walking close to his side
3.
In the bright sunlight, ever rejoicing
Pressing my way to mansions above
Singing his praises gladly I’m walking
Walking in the light, sunlight of love.

hymns.title: MεYε BIRIBI AMA YESU
hymns.lyric:
1.
Agyenkwa wo dƆ nti
Wowu maa me
εmmfata sε mede
Biribi kam’wo
DƆm me kra koto wo
Adi ne bƆhyε so
Na wabƆ afƆdeε
Ama w’seesei.
2.
Ma me nokorε koma
A εsε wo de no
Na dabiara mu no
Woahu me sε
Mahyε dƆ dwuma bi ase
Mayε ayamyε bi
Matwe kobƆfoƆ bi
Mede ama wo.
3.
Deε mewƆ deε meteε
W’akyεdeε kwa
Dε mu o yea mu o
Wura meyε wo de
Na mehu woanim a
Me kra a woagye o yi
Meresanten nyinaa mu.
Bεyε wode.

hymns.title: SOMETHING FOR JESUS
hymns.lyric:
1.
Savior, thy dying love thou gavest me,
Nor should I ought with hold,
Dear Lord, from thee, in love my soul would bow
My heart fulfill its vow, some off’ring bring thee now
Something for thee.
2.
Give me a faithful heart, likeness to thee
That each departing day
Henceforth may see some work of love begun
Some deed of kindness done, some wand’rer
Sought and won, something for thee
3.
All that I am and have thy gifts so free
In joy, in grief, thro life dear Lord, for thee,
And when thy face I see, my ransomed
Soul shall be, through all eternity,
Something for thee.

hymns.title: KA ME HO AWURADE
hymns.lyric:
1.
Ka me  ho wura
Mentumi nkwati wo ntena ase
Mentumi nnya wo ntu namƆm biako
Wo ammoa me a
Menntumi nsoa bra adesoa yi
Mehia sε me twere wo ahoƆden.
2.
Ka me ho wura
Na sε amaneε bεn a
Na sƆhwε ahum tu fa me tiri so a
Anaa nsuo yiri twa me ho hyia mpo a
Hwee rennyε me, na mekoma mmƆ hu.
3.
Ka me ho wura
Na sε amaneε bεn a
Na sƆhwε ahum tu fa me tiri so a
Anaa nsuo yiri twa me ho hyia mpo a
Hwee rennyε me, na mekoma mmƆ hu.
4.
Ka me ho wura
Sε menni obi mpo a
Sε εba sε me su wƆ yea mu a
Na me merε a mεfi asaase yi so du a
O mesrε sε Awurade, ka me ho.

hymns.title: M’ASI MEBO
hymns.lyric:
1.
M’asi mebo sε merenkyinkyin bio
Wiase anigye twee me.
Neεma a εkorƆn, neεma ‘di mu
Na afei εdƆ me kƆn.
NyesoƆ
MεkƆ ne nkyεn ntεm so
Ntεmso anigye mu
Yesu, kεse a Ɔkorεn
Me reba wo nkyεn.
2.
M’asi mebo sε mεkƆ Agyenkwa hƆ
Meregyae me bƆne yi
Ɔne nokorε no, na Ɔyε tenenee
ƆwƆ nkwansεm no.
3.
M’asi mebo sε mεdi Agyenkwa akyi
Dabi’a medi nokorε
Métier deε Ɔka, mεyε deε Ɔpε
Ɔne nkwa kwan no.
4.
M’asi mebo sε mεkƆ ahenie n’mu
Mεgyae bƆne akwan no
NamfoƆ bεpo me, tamfoƆ bεba m’so
Mεwura mu ara.
5.
M’asi mebo,  hwan na Ɔne me bεkƆ
Monntwεn nnamfoƆ momra
Twerε no kyerεkyerε yεn, Honhom di yεanim
Yεbεtu soro kwan no.

hymns.title: I AM RESOLVED
hymns.lyric:
1.
I am resolved no longer to linger,
Charmed by the world’s delight
Things that are higher, things that are nobler
These have allured my sight
Chorus
I will hasten to him, hasten so glad and free
Jesus, greatest, highest, I will come to thee.
2.
I am resolved to go to the Savior,
Leaving my sin and strife, he is the true one,
He hath the words of life
3.
I am resolved to follow the Savior,
Faithful and true each day, heed what He sayeth,
Do what He willeth, he is the living way.
4.
I am resolved to enter the kingdom,
Leaving the paths of sin; friends may oppose me,
Foes may be set me, still will I enter in.
5.
I am resolved, and who will go with me?
Come friends, without delay, taught by the Bible
Led by the Spirit, we’ll walk the heaven’ly way.

hymns.title: YEREPEMSO KƆ
hymns.lyric:
1.
Yεrepemso kƆ daa nkwa mu
Yεn anim nko na yεdi nkunim kƆ
Dabiara yε kƆ ko mu
Yεerko ma tenenee
Ɔhene tumfoƆ no mara ase
Yεde ahosεpε to dwom yi n’ayε
Yε‘ ne no bεtena daadaa
Sε yε di nkunim a .
Nyesoε
Yεrepemso kwan no mu, kƆ bea a bƆne nni hƆ
Pemso kwan no mu, bea a bƆne nni.
Twere no daa ahobreaseεm,  twere no da biara
Yεdi nim ne tumi kεsemu, tumi m’yεdi nim.
Yεdi nokorε ma Kristo, nokorε ma Kristo
KƆsi sε yεbεdi nim, yεko ma nokorε ne tenenee
Yεrepemso anigyeεm.
2.
Yε‘ne yεn wura bƆ nsra dabiara
Yεretu kwan kƆ ƆdƆ man mu
YεrekƆ fie, yεrenkyin bio, mfi Yesu dƆ ho
Anigyesεm, yε ne no nante
Hann a εhyerεn wƆ Bethlehem
RekƆ Ɔsoro fie.
3.
ƆbƆnekobƆfoƆ bεdom yεn
Ma yεn nko ma Yesu ne tenenee
Ɔrefrε wo, ansa na anadwo aba
BεdƆm anigye kuo n’
Ɔbεyi wo ho bƆne ne fi
εy nti na Ɔsoaa asendua no
Sε wopε a Ɔde ƆdƆ
Nwom bεhyε wo komamu.

hymns.title: MARCHING ON
hymns.lyric:
1.
We are marching to eternity, ever forward,
Winning victory, into the fray, day after day
We’re fighting for the right, the right’
We’re under orders from the mighty King,
Joyful His worthy praise we sing;
With him we’ll be eternally, when we have won the
Fight, the fight.
Chorus
March, march on the way land free from all sin
We are marching on the way to the land that’s free
From sin.
2.
With our leader marching day by day,
To love’s country we are on our way
We’re going home, never to roam from Jesus
And his love, his love
O what a joy to walk the road with Him,
In the light that shined on Behtlehem
We march along with happy song, bound for the land
Above, above
3.
Wand’ring sinner, come and join the fight,
March with us for Jesus and the right
For you He calls, ere darkness falls come,
Join the happy throng, glad throng
O he will take away your sin nd dress,
Twas for this he bore the cruel cross
Now if you will, your heart He’ll fill with love’s
Eternal song, sweet song.

hymns.title: SIESIE WO HO HYIA WO NYAME
hymns.lyric:
1.
Howhini, wo da so kyinkyin
Wayera afi Nyame nnwan mu
εnti wo nte ne frε yi
Yε ahoboa hyia wo Nyame.
NyesoƆ
Howhini tie kƆkƆbƆ yi
εfi sε wo nkwa retwam’
εyε ya sε w’bεhyia Nyame
A won yεε ahoboa bi’aa
2.
Adεn na wonni botae bi’aa
Bere a wo nkwanna retwam
Na wote ahuhubra mu
Yε ahoboa hyia wo Nyame.
3.
εnti wo nte wo nnamfo a
WƆdƆ wo no adesrε yi
εbia Ɔkkyena rento wo
Na wo’kƆ a akƆhyia Nyame.
4.
Sε wo po nsa tofrε yi
Na woma Honhom no kƆ a
Wo bεhu wo mƆborƆ tebea
Sε wontumi nhyia Nyame.

hymns.title: PREPARE TO MEET THY GOD
hymns.lyric:
1.
Careless soul, why will you linger
Wand’ring form the fold of God?
Hear you not the invitation?
O prepare to meet thy God.
Chorus
Careless soul, o heed the warning,
For your life will soon be gone,
O how sad to face the judgment,
Unprepared to meet thy God.
2.
Why so tho’tless are you standing
While the fleeting years go by,
And your life is spent in folly?
O prepare to meet thy God.
3.
Hear you not the earnest pleadings
Of your friends that wish thou well?
And perhaps before tomorrow
You’ll be called to meet your God.
4.
If you spurn the invitation
Till the Spirit shall depart
Then you’ll see your sad condition,
Unprepared to meet thy God.

hymns.title: NE NYINAA Yε
hymns.lyric:
1.
WƆ Nyame y’Agyenkwa dƆ m’
Bribi’ a bε yε yie
N’adƆeε nsesa, Ɔde kyε
Ne nyinaa yε
Mogya a som bo sa yεn yadeε
Adom a yε pε afrε yεn
Nsa a yε den bƆ yεn ho ban
εsε sε εyε yie.
2.
Sε yε fa amanehunu mu mpo a
Bribi’a bε yε yie
Yε wƆ nkwagye a εyε pε
Ne nyinaa yε
Yε‘anigye sε yεtwere Nyame a
Yε so aba yε tena Kristo mu a
Honhom no di yε anim kƆ ahoteεm’
Sε sε εyε yie.
3.
Yεrehwε nna pa anim
Bribi a bε yε yie
Gyedie tumi fa awerεhoƆ m’
Ne nyinaa yε
Yεtwere yεn Agya no dƆ
Yesu ma yεn bribi a yεhia
Nkwa mu o owuo mu mpo
εsε sε εyε yie.

hymns.title: YεDE KRISTO KYERε WIASE
hymns.lyric:
1.
Kristo mra wiase, yε team
Yεde wiase brε Kristo
Anibreso, hiafoƆ ne deε wƆsu
Ne deε wƆayε mrε
Ne deε bƆne ayare no
Kristo boa wƆn.
2.
Kristo mra wiase, yεteam
Yεde wiase brε Kristo
MpaebƆ denden m’
AkobƆfoƆ nyinaa
AkƆnnƆ twetwe wƆn
Wagye wƆn aboƆden
Afi sum mu.
3.
Kristo mra wiase, yεteam
Yεde wiase brε Kristo
Adwene korom
Yεkyε adwuma no, yεgye animka bi’a
Yεsoa asendua no
Ma yε‘Awurade.

hymns.title: CHRIST FOR THE WORLD WE SING
hymns.lyric:
1.
Christ for the world, we sing,
The world to Christ we bring
With loving zeal; the poor and them that mourn
The faint and overborne, sin-sick and sorrow worn
Whom Christ doth heal.
2.
Christ for the world, we sing
The world to Christ we bring
With fervent prayer, the wayward and the lost
By restless passions tossed, redeemed at countless cost
From dark despair
3.
Christ for the world we sing,
The world to Christ we bring
With one accord, with us the work to share
With us reproach to dare, with us the cross to bear
For Christ our Lord.

hymns.title: WƆ KALVARY
hymns.lyric:
1.
Nna a meseε n’ahunu bra mu kwa
M’anndwen sε wƆbƆƆ me wura asendua m’
Na mennim sε me nti na Ɔwui wƆ Kalvary.
NyesoƆ
HƆ n’ade AhummƆbƆ, na adom kyε
BƆne fafiri dƆƆso maa me ho
Me kra a wabrε yi nyaa faahodie wƆ Kalvary.
2.
Nyame asεm maa me hu me bƆne
Me ho poo sε mebuu mra no so
KƆsii sε me kra danee ne ho kƆ Kalvary.
3.
Afei mede birirbi a ma Yesu
Mede anigye afa no sε me Hene
Me kra wƆagye no n’bεto Kalvary nko ho nnwom
4.
O ƆdƆ a εhyehyεε nkwagye
O adom a εde brε nnipa
O abun kεse Nyame twaeε wƆ Kalvary.

hymns.title: AT CALVARY
hymns.lyric:
1.
Years I spent in vanity and pride,
Caring not my Lord was crucified,
Knowing not it was for me He died on Calvary
Chorus
Mercy there was great, and grace was free
Pardon there was multiplied to me,
There my burdened soul found liberty, at Calvary
2.
By God’s word at last my sin I learned,
Law I’d spurned, till my guilty soul imploring
Turned to Calvary
3.
Now I’ve giv’n to Jesus everything,
Now I gladly own  Him as my King,
Now my raptured soul can only sing of Calvary
4.
Oh, the love that drew salvation’s plan
Oh, the grace that bro’t it down to man,
Oh the mighty gulf that God did span at Calvary.

hymns.title: M’AGYENKWA DƆ
hymns.lyric:
1.
Mede ahodwiri gyina
Yesu Nazaretni n’anim
Na medwene sε ƆdƆ me
BƆneyεni a me ho nte yi.
NyesoƆ
Hwε fε a εyε, εyε nwanwa
Na me daa nnwom bεyε sε
Hwε fε a εyε, εnyε nwanwa
M’Agyenkwa dƆ a ƆwƆ ma me.
2.
AbƆfoƆ hwεε N’awerεhoƆ mu
Na wƆfii han kuo mu bae
Bεkyekye n ewerε awerεhoƆ a
Ɔdii maa me anadwo no.
3.
Ɔfaa me bƆne ne awerεhoƆ
Na Ɔmaa no yεε ne de
Ɔsoaa adesoa n’kƆƆ Kalvary
Huu amane na Ɔwui wƆ hƆ.
4.
sε me ne ahotefoƆ anuonyam mu
Afei huu n’anim a
M’ani bεgye mfesanted mu
Mεto ne dƆ ho nnwom.

hymns.title: MY SAVIOR’S LOVE
hymns.lyric:
1.
I stand amazed in the presence of Jesus the Nazarene
And wonder how he could love me, a sinner,
Condemned, unclean.
Chorus
How marvelous, how wonderful and my song shall ever
Be how marvelous, how wonderful is my savior’s love
For me.
2.
in pity angels beheld Him, and came from the world of
light, to comfort Him in the sorrows He bore for my
Soul that night.
3.
He took my sins and my sorrows,
He made them his very own
He bore the burden to Calvary,
And suffered, and died alone.
4.
When with the ransomed in glory
His face I at last shall see
Twill be my joy thro’the ages
To sing of His love for me.
